website_summaries.verdict: Portable charger with 2 USB ports offers high-speed recharging.
pros: 2 USB ports can charge 2 devices at the same time
Comes with a micro USB cable, travel case, and 18-month warranty
Can charge an iPhone nearly 6 times
cons: Some customers found that it charges devices less than it claims to

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for a year and a half, and then recently, while plugged in overnight, the connection between the cable and battery melted. Major inconvenience while traveling overseas. Update: Anker speedily resolved the issue for me by replacing the battery, and followed up to make sure the replacement arrived and was working. They also seem to take great care in trying to discover what caused the issue in the first place, with photos and diagnostic questions, and had an engineer involved in the issue. It appears my issue was a fluke. I remain a big fan of Anker, and use many of their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Had a SLIGHT issue AT FIRST.
customer_reviews.text: Update to a previous not so positive review. After speaking with Anker customer service, which EVERYONE was EXTREMELY helpful and understanding of my situation. Unless something major happens I will definitely remain a dedicated Anker customer.
customer_reviews.author: Corp

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware: very short lifetime
customer_reviews.text: This thing stopped charging after 3 months! Of course you can only return it for one months. all the great reviews were probably written during the first month of use and all the bad ones after!
customer_reviews.author: CaSF

customer_reviews.title: :c didn’t work for me and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for a trip and worked really well .......for the first two weeks. After that the battery pack would not fully charge. I had to wait until I got back to contact seller. Sent an email and never got a reply. I had missed the return deadline given that I was not in the country. This was such a waste of money. I was really looking forward to using this pack for a long time given the numerous high reviews on the products from anker and this specific pack. Will have to look elsewhere I guess :c
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Worked just long enough to get passed the return date. Won't charge longer than a minute and shuts off. Disappointed since this got so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: CNBurn

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a few months
customer_reviews.text: This WAS a great charger for a couple months. I bought it primarily for a trip to Disney and it was amazing! But now, only 4 months later it won't charge at all. Not sure if other have experienced the same thing? I bought it because the reviews are stellar- super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandriabeth

customer_reviews.title: I've had this thing a little over 8 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing a little over 8 months and now when I charge it it stays on one blue light and won't go to 4 I've let it charge for more than 2 days a d it stays the same if you could maybe help me and send me a new battery or help fix the problem that would be great I still having received a email or message to help me with this I really had great hopes for this item and I was hoping to use it for school but now it doesn't charge anymore so please can I have help with this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ulda

customer_reviews.title: First 1 died quickly, but company replaced quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller Anker charger I loved but it died after a year so we replaced it with this one. We only had our 13000 charger for a month when it stopped taking a charge or fully charging our devices. We emailed the company and they got back to us quickly sending us a replacement immediately. It's been a few weeks and so far it hasn't shown any signs of slow charging or any other problems... so thank you Anker for you good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: EMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Does not last as long as my other lower capacity batteries.  BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Decently made product and plastic housing seems to be pretty sturdy. Only problem is the battery drains FAST and doesn’t even last as long as some of my other lower capacity batteries. Overall, I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Prefer this over 20100
customer_reviews.text: Great battery. I prefer this over the 20100 due to size and weight. I have both and I find myself using this one 95% ofthe time. ***NOT CHARGING PROPERLY SOLUTION*** I have this battery and have used it countless times. The issue for those that have charging issues seems to be the output of the charger itself. In my experiences, if you use a low output charger it does not charge well. If you use a high output charger, you will be fine. Use an anker cable for best results.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son when we travel. I made sure to leave it charging over night so it would be ready the next day. When he tried using it, it would only charge for about 4-5mins and stop. The LED indicator lights showed full charge but it stopped working. The device was not fully charged. We tried swapping cables and using it on other devices but it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Rich R.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger from a great company
customer_reviews.text: Snagged this when the price was too good to pass up. I already had a PowerCore 10000 and the 13000 is great for longer trips & just handy to have around as a second charger (can swap between the two depending on which needs recharging). The build quality is great and it only takes slightly longer than the 10000 to fully charge (i.e. a few hours with the right charging unit); don't mind the reviews complaining about absurdly long charge times—that's just what happens when you use a basic 5W iPhone charger. Highly recommend this charger or any of Anker's other offerings---you can't go wrong with any of their chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Marty DiBergi

customer_reviews.title: stopped working properly after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: I had this charger for a little over 1 year..now it's acting up. It shuts off itself both when being charged and charging my phone. Other times the lights are on but no power is going to the phone to charge it. It was a reliable device until now. Not sure what's the reason but it's disappointing that I spent so much for a good power bank to only own it for1 year only.
customer_reviews.author: juaney

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product from Anker, a trusted source as my old external battery would not work with my new iPhone X. I plugged this unit in after fully charging and it appeared to work for a few seconds, then a message appeared that stated "this device may not be suitable to charge this device". The battery immediately stopped charging my phone. The advertisement clearly states that the product is intended for "iPhone". I am returning this product. My confidence in Anker has dropped significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This has never worked. Won't take a charge at all. One blue light blinks endlessly even after 12 straight hours of charging with the included charging cord. I hoped the cord was the defect so after several tries I tried 1 other charging cord that was brand new and came with a battery charger for large batteries (such as 18650 size). Same result. I'm hoping their limited warranty covers this as I've been dealing with a rather lengthy and serious illness and neglected to send it back while the return window was still open. I'll update this review to reflect my experience with their customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: BlueDogsBSK

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging but customer service is amazing and sent a new one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this since April and I use it when I travel so I don’t have to bring a charger. It is now November and I have used this on a total of four business trips. It stopped charging. I called Anker and they immediately sent a new one. Amazing customer service and hopefully the new one I receive works as good as this one did while it was working.
customer_reviews.author: MissZ

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give it 1 star is because shortly after the warranty ended, the charging time for the charger itself went from roughly 8 hours, to about 72 hours or 3 or so days. I was sure to use the cord it came with, and plug it into appropriately powered inputs. It was never dropped nor exposed to moisture No matter what factors I change, it still takes about 3 days to fully charge. Will not be buying another. Warranty should be 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: sam Cary

customer_reviews.title: The product worked great for my first couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting way too long to write this review. I was prompted by a friend who had a recent experience. I was skeptical at first given this was my first Anker purchase. The product worked great for my first couple of months. After about 2 months the powercore went to complete dust. Didn't hold a charge and wouldn't charge anything. I travel a lot and was hoping this would be a godsend, but it has sorely disappointed in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The battery pack appears to be in perfect order and holds a charge but it takes forever ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack appears to be in perfect order and holds a charge but it takes forever to charge it. It literally took 10 hours to charge it which cannot be right. I tested this a few times now and plugged it in before bed and it still was only 75% complete charging from the wall socket when I woke up. That makes this basically not usable. I feel like I wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Good, until it stops working.
customer_reviews.text: I really love Anker products, I’ve bought a lot, and they still last me to this day. However, this power bank stopped working for me less than a year of owning it. Only used it a hand full of times for trips. Loved the quick charge it gave my iPhone though. One day I went to charge it up, and it made my charger really hot - both it and my charger stopped working. Never could get it to charge again, no matter what I used.
customer_reviews.author: ❤

customer_reviews.title: much better. I will be returning
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a defective one. It keeps turning off and didn't even charge my phone to 100% after 7 hours. My old battery back which recently died was much, much better. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe's mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Charge
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite size for the charge it holds. 3amp output EACH! I have used it for over 16 months and still holds charge great! I even keep wires connected to it weeks on end without any devices attached to it and no "vampire" charge drain. Charges your iphone quickly a few times. 12' iPad pro charge does drain it quite a bit, but completely fine. It's been dropped tons of time and still works fine . ONLY DOWNSIDE - you cannot charge your devices and have it plugged in to charge simultaneously. Anker is the best.
customer_reviews.author: M.R

customer_reviews.title: Great to throw in a backpack or bag.
customer_reviews.text: May be a little heavier than most women want to add to their purse. Better suited for a bag, backpack, briefcase, etc. You’ll want to charge this overnight if drained as it takes a while to do so. It will charge an iPad if not in use; charging while watching videos or playing games will not get you the same result, but will keep it (iPad) from draining nearly as fast while charging slightly in the process depending on what you’re doing, apps you’re using, etc. If you want to truly charge while using an Apple product, get the 20,000 mah or 26,800 mah battery. Both of those are awesome, just heavy & bulky.
customer_reviews.author: chuckntx

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love!!! Very useful to keep in my purse as backup
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a 'techie' type of person, but have found this very useful. My college-aged kids were quite impressed when Mom came to the rescue when their phones were almost dead (and they hadn't charged their own batteries-sigh). I was impressed that it did 4 full charges on phones, and the battery charger only went down one notch. This was a very wise purchase, and I would definitely recommend this product to others. Thank you Anker!
customer_reviews.author: Truffles

customer_reviews.title: Held charging power 3 years for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this nearly 4 years ago, charged it up & never really used it much until a recent prolonged power outage. It quickly charged my iPad, iPhone, and Kindle Oasis several times. All this after laying on the shelf for years! Frankly, I thought it would no longer have charging power after sitting unused for so long. So now I’ve got it fully charged up again, all ready for the next emergency. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Emsweller

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Anker portable charger about a year ago and it's worked beautifully. It has 2 ports so I can charge two devices at once. I can usually recharge my phone a couple of times before feeling like I should recharge the unit. I just plug it in and go to bed and wake up to it fully charged. I put it back in my purse and i'm ready to go! After a year it stopped charging just randomly. I contact Anker who promptly replaced the unit under warranty. I was not expecting that and was pleasantly surprised. Thank you Anker! I am a life long customer now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Powers

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well
customer_reviews.text: I needed a battery pack to hook up to my backpack to keep our phones and fans charged while walking around Disney and this did great. It isn’t super heavy or bulky and charged my phone (IPhone 6s plus with a battery case on it) about 8 times fully over the 3 days we were walking around the park and I never even had to plug it in to charge it. It still has about 1/4 battery life left. Over all I would definitely recommend it especially if going to an amusement park where you’re taking tons of photos and videos and using the park app to find your way around.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa KTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Reliable workhorse for a year, then it died.
customer_reviews.text: I had this powerbank for a little over one year, and used it constantly. Despite being a little chunky and on the heavy side, it was worth carting around in my purse to provide a daily end of day booster to my phone while at home and on my travels. It worked fine charging with my adapters in Thailand, Singapore, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Dubai, Egypt, and Greece before inexplicably dying on me in Denmark two weeks ago. It just does not keep a charge any longer. Here I am now in Indonesia with a dud.
customer_reviews.author: BaltimoreStyle

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one, it’s great.
customer_reviews.text: I use my portable charger on a daily basis, for the most part of my day I’m on the road and I usually carry around my iPhone X, my work phone, and my AirPods. I’m constantly running out of power so this comes in handy and it can charge all my devices and a little more with just one charge. I got my first one stolen so this is the second one I buy. Anker is my go-to brand when it comes to chargers and cables. It is a little expensive in my opinion but I guess it’s worth it compared with other brands. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: I trust Anker based on my experience
customer_reviews.text: I'm always willing to pay a few $ more for the Anker brand. I've had good experience with their products in the past and the first months of owning this battery are consistent with my experience. The only reservation is that it is a little bulky for travel, but it fits perfectly in the sidepocket of my carry-on bag so it works well for me. Having 2 output ports and a large capacity makes it very practical for long flights watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: Doc B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice back up to have
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have this back up power! One thing to know is that when charging your iPhone with this, plug the phone into the line BEFORE plugging line into charge! For some reason it wouldn’t charge when the line was attached to charger than connect the phone. Otherwise it works great
customer_reviews.author: roguemckenzie

customer_reviews.title: [UPDATE] Carrying case came defective
customer_reviews.text: [UPDATE] 01/15/2020 Anker contacted me and sent me not just one but TWO carrying cases in perfect condition. Great Product and customer support. I change my review to 5 star. Original Review: The battery is excellent, I have the 10.000mAh too and both work as expected but the carrying case of this one (13.000mAh) has a hole in the bottom part and my battery almost fell. Battery 5 star, case 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Guillermo Moreno Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: A faithful friend - bought 2 yrs ago and still love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 13,000 portable charger two years ago on July 11, 2017. Since then, I’ve used for sporting events, vacations, camping, general usage around the house, road trips, etc etc. Totally impressed by Anker quality vs. my other power banks, and I will definitely be buying Anker products in the future. Anker has a loyal customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It Performed as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: A short review here. We used the Anker Powercore 13,000 over a 1.5 month trip to the Philippines. When the cell phone power dropped, my wife, seated behind me on a motorcycle, on long distant trips or crazy city driving, had this product tucked into the front of her pants to keep it in place and connected to the cell phone she held, so as to keep the GPS operating and her providing to me directions. No GPS, because of a cellphone power outage? We would have been in big trouble. Thanks to this backup product, we stayed out of trouble. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. G.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this power bank.
customer_reviews.text: My old charging bank needed replacing, and I went with this Anker model. So happy I did. I have two older iPhones (5 &6) that need charging regularly, and this little baby is so perfect. My previous bank had trouble with the connector shorting out if it was moved, and became worse till I chucked it. I have had this for over. 3 months, and it behaves solidly, without fail, and charges really quickly on both ports. One of the reasons I chose it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Higher frequencied

customer_reviews.title: Anker Powercore 13000mah
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my aging set of Lumsing Grand A1 Plus 13400mah powerbanks as they are getting old in charge cycles, out of warranty, and the company is no more. So I've been looking for a brand and powerbank that is of similar physical size, similar capacity, and reliable warranty. Decided to give the Anker Powercore 13000mah a try. 30 days of use thus far it charges a variety of compatible devices with no issues. I like it. The real verdict will be within two years. Will I experience overheat from faulty components? Well I don't know yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hamstersadancin

customer_reviews.title: perfect travel battery
customer_reviews.text: the only con about this battery pack is that it takes a very long time to get fully charged...but I guess that is to be expected since it will keep all your devices going for hours on end. Took it to Disney and kept 2 iPhones, 1 Samsung S7, and 2 portable fans for the kids fully charged for the 12 hour days we were doing there. One of the best purchases I have made on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This was my second Anker portable charger. I bought this one to replace one that I had owned for 2 years and used regularly but was due for an upgrade. I was really happy with my last purchase so I didn’t think twice about going with this same brand. Sadly, it’s been less than a month since my purchase and this is already not charging. It won’t go past the second light no matter how long I have it plugged in to charge and it dies after one full charge on my phone. I’ve tried different outlets and different USB wall plugs that will work for everything else and will just not work for this. I’m extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Dependable !
customer_reviews.text: This device has spoiled me. The quality is superior and it’s the perfect size!! So perfect I also bought for a family member. Now it does take a few hours to get a full charge, but it will surely last at least for the next 4 days without a recharge, with continuous use. Definitely will continue to be an Anker fan.
customer_reviews.author: Boo Ki.

customer_reviews.title: So far works as described
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a week but impressed by its ability to quickly charge my IPhone over and over on a single charge. So far have had five recharges of phone and still shows has a few more charges left. Love having the charge level monitor to tell me when to recharge it. and since it's been nine days since I charged it and it has recharged phone five times I'm impressed it beats my other two solar chargers hands down and with level gauge its a total keeper. Weight is packable for what it does and it also can charge my Kindle in a pinch. Worth every penny. Would buy again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: rleigh1250

customer_reviews.title: ... of my devices (but when it did it worked great!! ) But after changing out my cables ...
customer_reviews.text: Right now I don't know if I should review this item as I've had it l less than 3 months and it's already completely died on me it's not charging any of my devices (but when it did it worked great!!) But after changing out my cables still to no avail. So, I called support I spoke with a representative named Ryan, he listened and agreed that my unit was defected and gathered the necessary info he needed and sent me out a replacement... I should have it in 3 to 5 business days. I'll keep you posted... To be continued
customer_reviews.author: Nysunriiz

customer_reviews.title: Very compact, high capacity, A+, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, with drawstring carrying pouch. Take it everywhere I go. I have an IPhone X and it will charge it completely 4 times without needing recharged. Charges the phone quickly. If you purchase, this item may or may not have a full charge. Mine 1 bar out of 4 in charge. It took a good little while to charge it completely. To make sure I got it fully charged. The first time you charge it, when it stops charging, u plug it, and then plug it back in to charge again, this will maximize the charge in the lithium batteries upon first full charge. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than most but great charger
customer_reviews.text: It’s a heavy battery charger for sure, but for anyone doing extensive traveling it’s absolutely fantastic. It charges my phone super fast and can charge multiple items extremely quickly. The only downside to this is that it is a substantially heavy battery pack. That being said I would absolutely purchase another as it meets my needs perfectly. I would rather have one of these in multiple battery chargers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dedicated Luggage Battery
customer_reviews.text: So my Travelpro suitcase has a USB battery bank pocket with a cable that gives it a USB out near the handle. I bought this for the express purpose of staying in my luggage and well I had forgot it for a few months. The worst happened and my phone died before an important call and this little guy saved the day! Still had what appeared to be close to 100% charge and fully charged up my iPhone. Anker once again came through for me. Proud, loyal customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient power source
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in December of 2017. Still works today. It has been on many flights and car trips across the country. I made a friend on one flight that didn't have anywhere to hook up his phone and it charged both of our phones at once! I carry it in my briefcase wherever I go. I can charge my phone 5 or 6 times on one complete charge. If I were to say anything bad about this portable battery charger is that the unit itself seems to take forever to recharge...like 10 hours or more. There are lots of choices and I see this one got some bad raps but it's been reliable for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Charger with even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent portable charger with lots of power that is wallet sized. Had the charger for several months and all of sudden it stopped working. Was within the warranty period so I contacted Anker. Within 1 week they sent me a replacement for the product that failed. This is the 2nd portable charger I've had from Anker. My first is over 3 years old and still working fine (just a little larger so this smaller size was nice for when I don't need as much portable power capacity).
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have never been disappointed with Anker products or their customer service. This is a compact charger I carry in my back pack. I've been able to get two full charges on my Galaxy S7 Edge and probably could have gotten more but decided to go ahead and recharge it. It does take a few hours to fully recharge it when you use it heavily but that has not been an issue for me as yet. I'm always recharging my stuff, especially when travelling. So I just find an outlet to plug it in while waiting for a flight. I'm very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Anker
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really need to get this charger but it was a great price and it's a bit lighter than my older, heavier, larger one from Anker I got a couple of years ago. I'm totally pleased with it. Lots of people have given the specs so I don't have to do that but I will say, I'll always choose Anker for chargers bases and back up battery products. They're just the best on the market at the most reasonable price for what they offer. I'm in no way a techie but Anker is the name that immediately comes to mind when I need something.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter as a Christmas present and she absolutely loves this. She uses it and brings it along with her everywhere. We are impressed with how fast this charges her iPhone and the amount of juice it still retains. Small, sturdy and a bit weighty but can carry around with ease (like putting it in a pocket of a jacket or small bag). So far, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M. Angco

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all.
customer_reviews.text: It just stopped holding a charge after a few months of use and now I had to buy a new power bank. I will tray a different brand like xiaomi or Ravpower because anker has let me down many times with cables and now this power bank which I always took good care. Ps: it stopped working a long time ago I just decided to leave a review now.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Carvajal

customer_reviews.title: loved it....
customer_reviews.text: I used this power bank for a trip 6 day camping trip down the Grand Canyon and then for a 3 week New Zealand trip. Great way to keep phone and tablet charged when no outlet is available. Sadly, I made the mistake of packing it in my checked bag and it ended up being confiscated.........so when you are traveling, DO NOT pack it in your checked bag, keep it in your carry-on! Happy travels!
customer_reviews.author: Ma Dy

customer_reviews.title: Carry-able and plenty of power.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this model because it had 2 USB charging ports. Holds a good charge. Have used it to charge both a Kindle and IPhone 8+ while at work. Weight is not bad for it’s capacity. Size is nice and compact. I probably not carry it in a pants pocket, but a bag, jacket pocket (it’s current carry spot), backpack, Murse, Purse would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: ILove2Shoot

customer_reviews.title: Works well, two ports are great, but it doesn't fast charge as the single port version did
customer_reviews.text: Works well, two ports are great, but it doesn't fast charge as the single port version did. It's fantastic and can recharge my phone multiple times and having the option of charging a second phone or device at the same time is great! One major disappointment is that this dual port version doesn't fast charge my Galaxy phone. I had the single port and that did fast charge. I tried different cables, including the cable off my fast charge outlet plug... but nope... it will not fast charge so it takes longer to charge up my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade25

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wonderful company!
customer_reviews.text: Anker is a wonderful reputable company who makes great quality products and actually stands behind them. The Anker PowerCore 13000 portable charger is very functional and efficient, allowing you to charge 2 phones at the same time. The small, compact device is user friendly and fits easily in my purse or coat pocket. After having this portable charger for 15 months, it stopped functioning while I was on vacation. I contacted Anker and they responded immediately. They sent me a replacement unit right away. The customer service is amazing, and often unheard of in business today. My family and I will continue to support Anker and purchase their quality products!
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Help with getting the battery to work properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery based on the excellent reviews for a planned trip to some remote parts of Cuba where I might not be able to charge my phone. The battery showed a full charge but never functioned to charge my phone for a few minutes before stopping. I’m now just back and want help to fix it or return it! Does anyone have a suggestion about what to do?
customer_reviews.author: Careful Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: unusable for solar setup - STOPS WHEN POWER IS PLUGGED
customer_reviews.text: It might be a decent pack, I'm not sure, but there is one major flaw that makes it unusable for solar installation. As soon as some power is plugged in the input, the outputs shut down! This is the stupidest thing ever... So if you want to put a solar panel before the pack and use the pack as a buffer for when things get shady or when night comes, well, that is impossible. Even if you don't use any solar panel, you will basically be unable to use this pack while charging it, what you plug into it will lose power.
customer_reviews.author: FLO

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This will charge my phone from 10% to full in less than an hour - it's wonderful. It takes awhile to charge the battery itself, but it holds a lot of battery life. It's a bit weighty but not so weighty that you can't stick it in your backpack or purse easily. I take it to nursing school when I need to make my phone last nine hours, and my classmates have started asking to borrow it during classes. With this, you won't have to worry about leaving your phone plugged in at the back of the classroom or having to leave your phone in the car because it's nearly dead. I've definitely gotten my money's worth out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: portable charger
customer_reviews.text: The charger is wonderful but be aware it matters what charging cord you use. The accompanying cord is a very slow charging cord. However the cord that I use for my regular quick charging connected to the outlet will charge my phone much faster on the portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a heated vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife a heated vest here on Amazon and it did not include the necessary battery pack. This one appeared to be a good option as it was small and also had more power than some of the other brands. Turns out it works perfect. The vest has a small pocket for holding the battery pack and this one fits just right. She tried out the heater in the vest and ran it for about 30 minutes...after which the charger was still reporting full battery.
customer_reviews.author: Agent_CooperTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Cause for concern?
customer_reviews.text: I use the Anker 13K to charge mobile phones and earphones since my current residence doesn’t have enough wall outlets. The unit worked as expected for about a month or so. Thereafter, I began to notice issues when charging earphones with cases (eg, AirPods). The Anker 13K’s LED indicators would begin to flash for a short time before the unit shut off. The earphones and their respective cases usually appear to be near a full charge when it occurs, but it’s still a bit disconcerting. Our second Anker 1:K does not behave in this manner.
customer_reviews.author: notknwn_

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Charger to Date
customer_reviews.text: I travel to various anime and sci-fi conventions per year. I always had a problem charge my phone while at the cons as I had to take a break and attach to a wall socket. Well, not anymore with this little baby. I can now fully charge my phone in a matter of minutes on the go. Granted it does take awhile to charge the Portable Charger, it is well worth it as I got more time for my phone and cameras.
customer_reviews.author: AlexPCPA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this charger about 3 weeks for use while backpacking. It consistently gets my phone charged back up when I am on the go, giving me 2-4 charges (from 12-35% range) on a mobile or kindle in between charging the battery pack, and that's considering I usually don't have a chance to fully charge the power bank! Wish it was a little clearer exactly how to turn off the power bank when I have turned it on to check power level--unpluggung a USB connection seems to trigger power off automatically really smoothly, but I usually have to do a combo of double-clicks and holding power button to turn off otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts. -Update: it lasts longer if they ship you another one-
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but after 1.5 years of intermittent light use on trips, it tends to have trouble recharging itself when discharged fully. It took 4 days to charge 25%. Probably toast at this point ... not a bad life for an external battery, but disappointing considering the price. Edit: Raised from 3 to 4 stars. Anker got in touch with me based on the above review, shipped me a replacement of the same type, and it works just fine after about a month of medium-duty use with no problems. I like a company that stands behind its products, and will purchase from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Broseph

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have had the product for about a month and took it on a one week trip to the west coast to visit the grandkids. Used it to charge both our Samsung S6s (I know old), her tablet, and both our Kindle Fire& paperwhite reader. Worked fine and didn't run out of power. Matched our desires and expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Fastest charger. Portable. Easy. Small.
customer_reviews.text: Whistling that's the feeling sounds you get when your phone being charged. Like it's forced a power of lighting into your phone without damage within minutes. It will shoot your phone to 100% battery life from ZERO in 25 to 30 mins depending on phone battery life and how much Anker has left in the bank. Beautiful. I use it instead of my wall home plug if I need it speed up charge or use apps that's heavily drain battery. Best portable charger you can ever buy. I name it.........Anker Skywalker :)
customer_reviews.author: Fred Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Anker stands by their products.
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got didn't charge up. I contacted anker, and they immediately replaced it since all of their stuff has an 18 month warrenty! No hassles at all. The new one works great! We haven't used it more than a full cycle; if there is anything to note I'll come back and add it.
customer_reviews.author: hatsuneko

customer_reviews.title: Portable Charger
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace my K2R. I like this one a little better because you don't have to wait until it's almost dead to recharge it (like the K2R). I mainly use it to recharge my phone while I'm at work and it keeps my phone at 100%!! Fast too!!!! I would definitely recommend this item to anyone needing a small portable charger. Works great and charges up pretty fast as well with an electrical outlet. I'll plug it in after 2 or 3 days of use and it's ready when I'm up the next day. (I'm sure it's done charging while I'm sleeping!) Fast delivery and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Boricua1966

customer_reviews.title: Why is the pack lopsided?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful portable battery back visually. Once you hold it you'll see the weight/battery is totally on one side of the pack. The charging port side is almost hallow and feels cheap. I find that non-evenly weighted items tend to be dropped more often. The previous generation Anker 13,000 mAh battery pack was more evenly weighted and built much better...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Used it on our trip loved it
customer_reviews.text: We used it on our trip and it worked wonderfully! Charged our phones through out the theme park didn't have to recharge until I got back home. AWESOME! Note: my dad took it with him to the dessert on a geology field trip, the temp got to 110... the battery did not work. Honestly I don't work in that heat. So if you want to do out doors stuff in extreme temps, good luck finding one that works. But if you want one that is awesome for airports and reasonable temperature environments... then this is by far the best battery! LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Best power bank ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best power bank ever. We’ve had our for 2 years, we still get 5-6 full phone charges out of it per use. Does take a while to charge, but since we use it for 1-2 weeks before having to recharge it, it really doesn’t matter. Fits in my purse and not too heavy. Just got my mom one because of how well it works
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Can charge my IPhone 3 times before needing a chaerge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Power Bank on the recommendation of a family member. My family plays Pokemon Go and we are always draining our phone batteries so we needed a power bank that would be able to charge multiple phones more than once before needing to be recharged itself. I have used other power banks in the past and none have been this reliable. So instead of having to bring 3 power banks when we go out raiding, we only need this one. It also allows for two phones to charge at the same time. I am going to be purchasing more for gifts. I am VERY happy with the durability and the performance of this power bank.
customer_reviews.author: love2adopt

customer_reviews.title: Very very slow charging
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going to send it back because I thought the charger was not included but then I found it . It charges very slow I have the one that T-Mobile sent me with my phone and it charge my phone with the 30 minutes with this one an hour has gone by and my phone has only charged 70% I do not see how it will charge two devices at the same time it will take hours before they charge. I'm going to return it it won't do me any good might as well keep the one from T-Mobile.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Still thick and heavy. Not as long.
customer_reviews.text: Anker is the only name I trust for batteries. I have a larger one but it takes up room and is heavy. For quick trips & flying I wanted to downsize. I got this one. It is thicker than the larger but half the length. Heaviness is there but it is a good trade for space. I know it will work just fine. Micro USB, no flashlight feature, came with a cloth satchel. Came pretty much dead. Fully charged in about an hour. Will be running some tests before traveling with it. Will update if I am able.
customer_reviews.author: Swtchks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I have already purchased two of these that are black from Amazon and the only reason I got a white one this time is my daughter keeps taking my wife's black box and says that she doesn't have it,now with My Wife having her another one that is white then my daughter very well can't say she doesn't have it because it's very easy to spot with it being white and everything. That way everybody's happy. I highly recommend these battery packs. Anker battery packs are the best. Trust me hands-down the best.
customer_reviews.author: Memory Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product crappy cord
customer_reviews.text: I love Anker products they are solid well-built with good components and they do not cheat on their specifications. This power bank is no exception. One star off, come on Anker what's the deal you make the best cables on the planet yet you include a cord not worthy of the twist tie that came on it. Skip the cord altogether and provided a better case or something. I mean really even the box it came in was 3 times the quality of the cord.
customer_reviews.author: mm1

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this.  This is the perfect size for travelling!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! I travel a lot for work and rather than sit next to charging station or hope the plane has an outlet,I carry this. While it does take FOREVER to charge up, it lasts FOREVER!! Just make sure you plug it in overnight if you know your going to need it. I have told all my fellow coworkers to get this and they all have. This is one product that is worth every penny and you get your moneys worth quickly. Since it is a good size you can carry it and phone in one hand. I even use it around the house!! I might have to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: D. Dixey

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for traveling to throw in a bag pocketable for men’s jeans 👖 just as an FYI because I did not realize this when I bought it it does not have USB C it’s all USB ports Make sure you charge it overnight really long to charge don’t leave it into long some people have complained that it does break
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to charge itself, but so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! 4 stars because the battery takes forever to charge (7ish hours overnight for a full charge), so if you're traveling and need to charge it again, if it's not a traditional plug-in-to-the-wall... like you're using your car or USB... this thing just won't charge up enough. I do my best to charge it at home. :) My iphone SE can get about 5-7 full charges from this (sometimes starting at 20%, others from 1%). At least it charges my phone pretty fast. That said, this is so cute! Dual ports and a beautiful white, comes with a little carry pouch, Android charger to charge it, a win-win for me and my SO!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Micro USB port has failed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on June 10, 2016. Since then, I only used it occasionally. Today, I noticed it was not charging properly, as the LED indicator did not flash even though the PowerCore was at a very low charge level. I wiggled the Micro USB end of the cable, and then the LED indicator began to flash. It appears that the malfunction has been caused by a broken Micro USB port. With that, I am not sure the product is even safe to use anymore. I looked around Amazon and Anker website and did not find an obvious way to exercise the product warranty, which has not yet expired. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: revised review 6/16/19
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1/19. Have 2 other Anker products - car charger (with 2 ports) & a plug ini charger (with 5 ports) - both of those still work fine. But this portable one stopped working few days ago: 6/12/19. Plugged into phone (fully charged unit) and said 2 or more hours until charged, then went up to 5 hours until charged! Checked connection, used a different, new USB cable with same results. Normally, when phone plugged in, it will say Faster Charging and show a percentage like 60% needs to be charged and will take about 1 hr or so. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Was fully charged in a few hours via my computer USB. The instructions say to fully use and recharge every few months so I decided to use it for charging my iPhone at home to drain the battery. I was able to recharge my phone 4x before the Anker got down to 25%. It's compact and will be easy to carry when traveling. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Keeps a charge
customer_reviews.text: Holds lots of juice. Took one on a trip and it kept a IPhone 8, and Two Samsung S8's charged for the day at WDW and the plane travel. Highly recommend getting more than one. One to keep in the kitchen misc drawer, one for the go bags when shtf, one for travel, one for the car in case those USB's in the car stop working, one to take on the boat for those of us who dont have a radio on the boat, one fo........
customer_reviews.author: Rockdpm

customer_reviews.title: Great Product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great product and had it over a year now. It charges my iPhone 6s Plus very quickly a couple times on a daily basis. It’s definitely sturdy in that I dropped it multiple times and there are multiple scratches throughout the charger. Now it still charges my phone very fast and has the same amount of charge as the first time I got it but it sometimes would have a irritating subtle electric gear turning sound coming from the charger. I’ll properly just buy another one once this one completely stops charging but until then it’s still doing its job very well. Sound comes only 1-2 every few weeks.. .
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Wu

customer_reviews.title: Incredible lasting power
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this battery pack so I could use my phone on long flights, while driving and to be able to take many pictures while sightseeing abroad. I was away for a month and only charged it once when it went down to two lights of power. It has two charging ports so my husband used it as well for his phone. It is a bit heavy to tote around however the performance and reliability outweighed that downside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: The Anker PowerCore 13000 Portable Charger was exceptional for its massive charge, enough to provide power to three iPhones and a small laptop during a day of sightseeing. Even after the charges there were two of the four lights shining, meaning around 50% of the stored charge remained available. I charged the Anker at night and it was always ready to go in the morning. Using adapters, I was able to charge the Anker in the USA, UK and Spain during my trip. Amazingly lightweight considering how much power it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Gajewa

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great battery life
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm really loving this portable charger. The unit has a nice heft to it and and a great surface finish which is pleasant to hold in the hand. After charging my iPhone Xs Max twice and my headphones the charger is only down to about 50% -- my old portable charger would be completely dead by now. My only (minor) complaint is that the power input port is micro USB and not USB-C. My experience has been that USB-C is more robust for a large number of plug/unplug cycles. But I knew that when purchasing this portable charger. For the price, you really can't go wrong with this Anker unit.
customer_reviews.author: mac007

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about a year and a half. Used it maybe 10 times total. It used to be amazing. Took it camping and charged my phone with no problems for two days. Went to use it recently and it is dead as dead can be. Will not recharge at all, no matter how long it is plugged in. I guess I can use it as a paperweight now? Update- Customer service sent me a new one right away and it works great! Thanks Anker!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Battery I bought 4!!!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older model Anker it lasted for over two years of everyday use! it still works but after two major drops it has definitely effect how many full chargers it has and how fast it will get your phone back to full. This new Anker is Amazing hold a higher charge, it charges my iPhone 6 plus from 2% to full in 20ish mins!! multiple times I am on my third charge with 3 dots left!! I have ordered one for every member of my immediate family! Don't leave it in direct sun light its a battery!
customer_reviews.author: Yaya Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing! Lightweight, small, and portable
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and frequently need a charge on the go. It has to output USB charging ports and one micro USB charging port. It takes a while to charge up, but I usually put it on charge when I go to sleep and it's done by the time I wake up. It will keep my phone or tablets for hours. My kids use it when we go on road trips to. Super handy to have for those times where you need your phone and are going to be away from a electrical outlet for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Chase T

customer_reviews.title: Does not have Fast Charge
customer_reviews.text: The main reason i bought this battery was because i read it supported Fast Charge. Fonally used it on vacation and Fast Charge did not work. The cable is not the problem since it works fine with car connection and wall connecrion.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little battery!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an overseas trip and I used it consistently. It holds about 3 charges (iPhone 11 Plus), is durable, easy to use, and very portable. I've had zero issues so far with use. It does exactly what it's supposed to. I'd definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Was not what I expected on Anker's behalf
customer_reviews.text: The actual battery has great power, it took me 2 hours to charge my iphone from 11%-100%. The light stayed on the first dot but never went up to the 4th in a matter of 2 days. I got this charger for a trip in a few days. I called Anker and they could not assist with sending me a new battery for my trip faster than 5 business days, after they get the returned item. Girl was very unhelpful. Not sure if I would like to bother repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: TIFFANY M

customer_reviews.title: The perfect charger
customer_reviews.text: Used Anker products for a long time and with good reason. Rock solid dependability in their products, even better customer support. This battery is ultra small and power packed. Coupled with the right charger block from Anker you can recharge your devices anytime anywhere no fuss no muss. 13000 mah ensures all day play with any of your devices. 2 ports allows you and a friend to stay topped up no matter where you are. They are top name when it comes to power banks for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and even better price
customer_reviews.text: Great battery and even better price! I had been using Mophie batteries for the past few years, but only purchased them during Black Friday sales when they were roughly 50% off. Even at that price they were still double the cost of Anker. I finally decided to order the 13000 mAh PowerCore and could not have been more pleased with it. It charges all my devices quickly and performs every bit as well as the much more expensive Mophie. We now own 3 of these devices and are loyal customers.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: Anker PowerCore 13000 Portable Charger
customer_reviews.text: Anker PowerCore 13000 Portable Charger. This charger has two ports so that you can charge two devices at same time with fast charging time. Great price for the quality of this product
customer_reviews.author: Kari Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Multiple charges for even the largest phone/tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after realizing that my smaller anker battery could only recharge my Nexus 6 about 70%. This one can recharge it multiple times. I know this is a first world problem but I appreciate the freedom of grabbing this on way to an event where there will a lot of waiting, knowing I'll have phone use throughout the wait, and walk out with 100% charge. Slightly more practical, it allows me to upload pictures and video during a full day of skiing without running out of battery in an environment where the cell radio is constantly flipping between no connection, 2G, 3G and 4G.
customer_reviews.author: David Deaven

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and best customer service around!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have been buying anker cables and portable charging banks for years! Everything is top quality and has never given us a major problem. The one time something stopped working, their customer service team is top notch and took care of us immediately without question. We will continue buying anker.
customer_reviews.author: Balitor

customer_reviews.title: This is a must for me
customer_reviews.text: Today I plugged my phone in on the deck while I watched a live stream event. It was comforting to know I'd still have power when I was done with the stream. As a coach, I make good friends of the kids whose phones die at an event. It's good for about 4 full phone charges. Lost my first portable charger, and I actually like the size of this one better as it's more compact.
customer_reviews.author: Discus Lover

customer_reviews.title: Anker- Best Customer Service #1
customer_reviews.text: Anker has best customer service, bought an Anker power core 13000 for girlfriend and she had issues with it. Anker emailed me a few times to make sure it works or will replace, as they did replace my Anker. Was shocked when see emails concerned of how I am satisfied with their products. Love Anker products and their Super Customer Service. Easy to buy for anyone for a gift... stocking stuffer for nieces or nephews. Will for sure buy again from Anker.. bday presents, Xmas presents, everyone needs a Anker Powercore now a days! Thank you Anker for all your help. 🙏👍🏽😷
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I’ve bought so far!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This product is great. Awesome quality, as Anker always delivers top notch products! Love Love Love how compact it is but still offers plenty of power to charge my iPhone XS Max multiple times. Easy to put in your purse or pocket. Check out the case that you could buy for it as well. It is awesome. I also use the 4 inch and 1 foot charging cables with this. It’s nice to have a short cable when you want to charge your phone while inside your purse or pocket. Love it very much and I highly recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Horseygal

product_meta.title: Anker PowerCore 13000 Portable Charger - Compact 13000mAh 2-Port Ultra Portable Phone Charger Power Bank with PowerIQ and VoltageBoost Technology for iPhone, iPad, Samsung Galaxy (Black)
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage: Join the 50 million+ powered by our leading technology.

Upgraded Capacity: The successor to PowerCore 10400—identical compact size but packed with even more power. Charges an iPhone 8 almost 5 times, an iPhone X or Samsung Galaxy S9 3 times, or an iPad Air 2 once.
Light and Compact: A super-high 13000 mAh capacity with two high speed USB ports is all contained in a portable charger smaller than a wallet.
High-Speed Charging: PowerIQ and VoltageBoost combine to deliver a max speed charge to any device (up to 3A - Qualcomm Quick Charge not supported). Input: 5V / 2A.
What You Get: Anker PowerCore 13000 Portable Charger, Micro USB cable, travel pouch, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month warranty and friendly customer service. (Wall charger not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars16,726 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Department: High Capacity: Charges the iPhone 6 four times, the iPhone 6 Plus or Galaxy S6 two and a half times or the iPad Air almost once. Safely recharges with a 2 amp output charger
